<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Quicksilver Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=97)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your features become thin and angular. You become swifter and nimbler, but your body also becomes fragile.

 **Benefit** You gain an item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain the listed status bonus to your Speed.

 **Drawback** You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost in this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus to rolls is +1, the bonus to Speed is +5 feet, and the duration is 1 minute.
